species.name: nidorina
descriptions: If the group is threatened, these Pokémon will band together to assault enemies with a chorus of ultrasonic waves.
It has a calm and caring nature. Because its horn grows slowly, it prefers not to fight.
The female has a gentle temperament. It emits ultrasonic cries that have the power to befuddle foes.
The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.
The horn on its head has atrophied. It’s thought that this happens so Nidorina’s children won’t get poked while their mother is feeding them.

abilities.name: poison-point
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: rivalry
abilities.effect: Increases damage inflicted to 1.25× against Pokémon of the same gender, but decreases damage to 0.75× against the opposite gender.

abilities.name: hustle
abilities.effect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.
